Sentencas: In this paper, the structural, microstructural, electrical and magnetic properties of an Mn2CoO4 spinel synthesized by means of EDTA gel processes are reported.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: The Rietveld refinement analysis of high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD) data revealed the formation of a tetragonal Mn2CoO4 phase.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: This phase undergoes a structural change into a cubic phase at elevated temperatures, and this process is associated with a change in lattice parameters.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: The afore-mentioned phase transition was also investigated via high-temperature Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: Temperature-dependent magnetization data revealed changes in the magnetic ordering temperature, which had been caused by the formation of antiferromagnetic (AFM) and ferromagnetic (FM) phases at low temperatures.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity increased with temperature and reached a level of 4.3 S.cm(-1) in air at 1073 K, which indicates that the spinel exhibited semiconducting properties.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel

Sentencas: This oxide can be considered as a material for protective-conducting coatings on ferritic stainless steel used to manufacture interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Magnetic and electrical properties of Mn2CoO4 spinel
